text:
Hey everyone! :slightly_smiling_face:
I'm Nicola, a freelance content writer based in the UK -- but most of my clients have actually been from the US and Canada, so timezones are no problem (thanks to async working).

I'd *love* to hear from anyone that's doing something exciting in the *productivity, employee wellness, or employee engagement space*. That's where my :yellow_heart: is.
My core service is writing high quality, SEO optimized (but written for humans, naturally!), informative blog posts. I have space for 2-4 articles per month, around 1-2k words each.

If you're interested, or know someone who is, I'd love to hear from you -- DM on here works, or my email is <mailto:nicola@nicolascoon.com|nicola@nicolascoon.com> if that's better for you.

text:
Hi everyone! My name is Shelby and I'm a freelance writer. 

I have 10+ years of communications experience & love to specialize in:

:heart: creative strategy 
:heart: branding 
:heart: blog content 

In my last full-time gig I spent nearly 4 years innovating for the City of Philadelphia. I’d love to be a part of your successes as well. You can DM me or email me at <mailto:shelby.m.fisk@gmail.com|shelby.m.fisk@gmail.com>. 

Learn more about me on Twitter:  
<https://twitter.com/shelbyfisk/status/1478427647961088004?s=21|https://twitter.com/shelbyfisk/status/1478427647961088004?s=21>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/ShelbyFisk|@ShelbyFisk>: Some :sparkles:personal (and professional):sparkles: news 

In 2021, I turned in one badge for another. While I’m no longer working with <https://twitter.com/PhiladelphiaGov|@PhiladelphiaGov>, I’m now enjoying life as a mama (insert every single cliché about it being the greatest job in the world). <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FIRuHASWYAQjHn3.jpg>
